typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> moviesDB
moviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy'),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AggregateComedyRating
AggregateComedyRating sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MoviesSink
